source_sentence: 賢聖集伽陀一百頌
translation: One hundred stanzas of the Sutra of the Collection of the Sages and saints, gathering together the teachings of the Buddha

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝散大夫試鴻臚
translation: Xitian zhuan jing sanzang朝散 dafu xi Hongun

source_sentence: 少卿明教大師臣天息災奉　詔譯
translation: Shaoqing Mingjiao daishi jing Tianshou cai Feng imperial edict translated

source_sentence: 稽首一切出世間　　三界最尊功德海
translation: He bowed his head in homage to all the transcendent beings of the three realms and the most honored ocean of merit.

source_sentence: 智火能燒煩惱垢　　正覺我今歸命禮
translation: homage to the fire of wisdom, which burns away the stain of affliction and enlightenment.

source_sentence: 稽首能拔生死嶮　　普竭憂惱貪癡海
translation: He bowed his head in homage to the feet of the Licchavi Vimalakīrti and, having crossed the great sea of desire, hatred, and folly, he entered nirvana.

source_sentence: 破彼塵勞罪業山　　我今歸禮妙法寶
translation: I now venerate the jewel of the Law, which destroys the mountain of all sins.

source_sentence: 稽首一切佛稱讚　　八聖道行作莊嚴
translation: He bowed his head in homage to all the Buddhas and praised them, adorned with the eightfold holy path.

source_sentence: 無為禪定漸圓明　　我今歸禮聖眾寶
內宮寶藏諸樓閣　　金玉摩尼種種光
translation: The inner sanctum was adorned with stores of jewels and towers, richly decorated with various kinds of jewel light.

source_sentence: 真珠瓔珞廣莊嚴　　百千天人恒遊履
translation: It is adorned with diamond necklaces and hundreds of thousands of celestial beings walk about.

source_sentence: 若得安居天界中　　修嚴佛寺獲斯報
translation: If you live in the realm of heaven and cultivate yourselves at the seat of enlightenment, you will obtain this reward.

source_sentence: 信心歸敬於三寶　　給施財帛精舍中
translation: He believed in the Three Treasures and honored them by bestowing gifts of all kinds of jewels.

source_sentence: 受彼人天快樂已　　當得涅盤寂滅果
精舍年深多摧壞　　重修嚴飾供佛僧
translation: As the temple grew in age, many of its buildings collapsed and were mostly destroyed. They were then restored and adorned again to serve the Buddha and the Sangha.

source_sentence: 常獲快樂住人天　　亦得涅槃寂滅果
translation: Through the attainment of peace and bliss one can live in heavenly realms, where there is neither pleasure nor pain.

source_sentence: 若於精舍施園林　　座具衣服湯藥等
translation: If he gives a seat, clothing, water, medicine, and so forth to the monks of his monastery

source_sentence: 復遇惡世飢難時　　施彼眾生飲食物
translation: He may give food and drink to all living beings in times of famine,

source_sentence: 如是而獲無邊福　　及得智者七聖財
translation: In this way, they obtain infinite merit and the seven holy treasures of the wise.

source_sentence: 消除一切惡道苦　　永受大富無窮盡
translation: remove all the suffering of bad destinies and permanently experience great wealth without limit

source_sentence: 諸佛如來行住處　　若人到已生恭敬
承事供養兼聞法　　深信修學依戒行
translation: to serve, honor, and listen to all the teachings of the Dharma with deep faith;

source_sentence: 當獲廣大無邊果　　譬如大海渺渺深
translation: You will attain a vast and limitless reward like the depth of the great ocean.

source_sentence: 以器較量算不及　　福德因緣亦如是
若人修建於佛殿　　寒熱風雨不能侵
translation: But if one wishes to build a buddha-pavilion, no cold or heat, wind or rain can enter it.

source_sentence: 最先獲證寂滅法　　圓滿一切隨意願
translation: first attains the realization of the teaching of extinction and fulfills all wishes

source_sentence: 若人塑畫於佛像　　憂惱疾病得解脫
復得生天勝妙身　　大智吉祥及尊貴
translation: He will be reborn in the heavens with a marvelous body, an auspicious sign of great knowledge, and a supremely noble one.

source_sentence: 若人重修於佛像　　當得堅牢無病身
長壽色力諸相圓　　後得涅盤寂靜樂
translation: long life, form, strength, and characteristics are complete, and later attain the bliss of peace and tranquility in nirvāṇa

source_sentence: 憂惱諍訟皆滅除　　勇猛辯才人稱讚
translation: Their griefs and hatreds are all extinguished. They are praised for their boldness and eloquence.

source_sentence: 調伏諸根而策勤　　一切莊嚴眾所敬
translation: He disciplined his sense faculties and applied himself energetically, revered by all the adorned beings.

source_sentence: 若人修諸佛像等　　遠離過失得生天
富貴端嚴眾所欽　　一切福德皆具足
translation: He was honored as the best of men because he possessed all virtues. Their wealth and their well-being were such that they were admired by everyone.

source_sentence: 破損塔廟若重修　　彼人無病身圓滿
translation: Likewise, if a holy man breaks down a tower or a shrine and builds it again, he will be free of sickness and fully enlightened.

source_sentence: 一切世間可愛果　　種種隨心皆具足
translation: All the desirable fruits of all worlds are variously fulfilled according to the mind

source_sentence: 若造佛像及佛塔　　形量至小如麥粒
translation: If you build an image of the Buddha or a stūpa, it will be as small in size as grains of wheat

source_sentence: 不唯天上與人間　　決定為王受快樂
有色無色生亦爾　　富貴無邊不可量
translation: So it is with the arising of form and formlessness. Their wealth is limitless and immeasurable.

source_sentence: 當離生老病死苦　　究竟菩提佛果圓
translation: will be freed from the suffering of birth, old age, sickness, death, and enlightenment.

source_sentence: 若於塔廟安舍利　　及畫佛像而供養
translation: offerings to the relics preserved in a stupa or to the images of the Buddha-qualities

source_sentence: 得彼智光極大地　　善逝淨妙佛富貴
translation: He attained the great sphere of the light of his knowledge, and was well endowed with the splendors of the buddha-field of the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 安住無邊眾生界　　同入平等無相性
translation: He abides in the boundless realm of sentient beings, entering equally into equality and signlessness.

source_sentence: 若於寂靜山峯上　　安置佛塔及相輪
translation: On the mountain peak of Siṃhala there is a buddha-field, adorned with stūpas and rings of signs.

source_sentence: 形量可如指節許　　當生一切人天中
端嚴大富色力安　　後作三十三天子
translation: He will be a prince of the thirty-three gods.

source_sentence: 若人以手開佛塔　　當獲富貴及具足
translation: If one opens a buddha-tathāgata’s stupa with his own hand, he will attain wealth and prosperity.

source_sentence: 身體光潔心柔軟　　多知性淨無瞋恨
translation: Their bodies are shiny, pure, and their minds are gentle. They know well the essential purity of nature and have no anger or resentment.

source_sentence: 若有智者行檀度　　施佛塗香及白檀
translation: If there is a wise one who practices sandalwood salvation, he bestows on the Buddha an ointment of incense and white sandalwood

source_sentence: 恭俱摩等種種香　　當獲廣大可愛果
translation: and all the various kinds of fragrances such as this perfume will give forth vast, agreeable fruits.

source_sentence: 若人信佛生歡喜　　持妙香花及音樂
translation: Those who believe in the holy Dharma rejoice with flowers, perfumes, and music.

source_sentence: 種種供養佛如來　　生天而感金寶池
以彼池蓮細香蘂　　遍身霑惹而澡浴
translation: He bathed his body with the fragrance of the lotus-trees in that lake.

source_sentence: 曼那吉儞水清淨　　入者塵垢自然除
波濤流湧噴香冷　　寶岸紅蓮周匝開
translation: The jeweled shore is surrounded by red lotus blossoms.

source_sentence: 天等覩斯恒適意　　給施佛僧得此報
如是功德不可量　　是故諸經結頌讚
translation: Because their merit is immeasurable, the scriptures praise it in verse.

source_sentence: 名衣及上服　　施佛及施僧
translation: Name-and-form robes and superior robes are given to the Buddha and to the saṃgha

source_sentence: 後生天界時　　最上天衣香
translation: At the time of later birth in the heavenly realm, the supreme celestial garment and fragrance

source_sentence: 青黃種種色　　百千摩尼寶
translation: various colors of blue and yellow, a hundred thousand maṇi treasures

source_sentence: 而用作莊嚴　　富貴而無量
translation: yet they are adorned by their use, rich and immeasurable.

source_sentence: 快樂亦無邊　　獲斯勝妙果
translation: Their happiness also has no limit, and they attain this marvelous result.

source_sentence: 若人生世間　　而得作國王
translation: If someone were to be born in the world and become king,

source_sentence: 具足諸色相　　上妙繒綵衣
translation: They are endowed with all forms and characteristics, the supremely beautiful silk robes.

source_sentence: 種種殊勝香　　隨身恒受用
translation: various kinds of excellent fragrance that are always experienced throughout the body

source_sentence: 皆因施佛衣　　成就如斯報
translation: It is all because of giving the Buddha's robe that they accomplish this kind of reward.

source_sentence: 若有生天界　　種種寶莊嚴
translation: If there is birth in the heavenly realm, various kinds of treasure adornment

source_sentence: 身挂珠瓔珞　　頭戴寶玉冠
translation: His body is adorned with a pearl necklace, and he wears a jeweled crown on his head.

source_sentence: 耳鐶及腕釧　　如是富快樂
translation: Their earrings and wristbands are thus rich and happy

source_sentence: 施佛莊嚴具　　獲天勝妙果
translation: bestow the Buddha's adornments to attain the most wonderful heavenly fruit

source_sentence: 若作大國王　　身相廣嚴飾
translation: If he becomes a great king, his body will be vast and adorned.

source_sentence: 瓔珞摩尼珠　　玎璫聲響亮
translation: diadem, maṇi-pearl, and the sound of a bell.

source_sentence: 亦是三寶田　　布施莊嚴具
translation: It is also the field of the Three Treasures, adorned with generosity.

source_sentence: 智者清淨心　　施佛花鬘等
translation: a wise person's pure mind gives flowers, garlands, and so forth to the Buddha

source_sentence: 天上及人間　　恒獲於快樂
translation: The gods and humans always attain happiness.

source_sentence: 復生後報中
translation: to be reborn in the afterlife

source_sentence: 成就七覺花　　復生天山地
translation: Accompanied by the flowers of the seven kinds of enlightenment, they'll again grow in the heavenly mountain ground

source_sentence: 而為帝釋主　　與彼諸眷屬
translation: He becomes the lord of Indra and his retinues.

source_sentence: 遊嬉於園林　　種種花供養
translation: to wander and play in the gardens, offering various flowers

source_sentence: 而獲如是果　　琉璃真珠寶
translation: yet he obtains such a fruit, the true jewel of lapis lazuli

source_sentence: 金銀青綠等　　莊嚴於繖蓋
translation: gold, silver, blue, green, and so forth are adorned by the canopy.

source_sentence: 團圓如滿月　　若王若大臣
translation: the lump is round like a full moon, whether king or minister

source_sentence: 而用覆頭頂　　如佛說此因
translation: yet it covers the top of one’s head, just as the Buddha explains:

source_sentence: 施蓋獲斯報　　解脫貪憂惱
translation: Giving the lid obtains this reward, liberating them from craving and sorrow

source_sentence: 無病恒安樂　　復作世間王
translation: without illness and always at ease, they'll again become kings of the world

source_sentence: 亦是施蓋報　　若於佛塔廟
translation: It's also the result of giving a lid if you were to place it in a stūpa or temple.

source_sentence: 布施於幢幡　　當作天輪王
translation: bestow it on banners and pennants to become the wheel-turning king of heaven

source_sentence: 世上無能勝　　遠離一切罪
translation: there is no one in the world who can overcome it and be free of all sins

source_sentence: 於諸眾生中　　而為於上首
translation: Among all sentient beings, he's the best among them.

source_sentence: 恒得人供養　　若人於塔廟
translation: always get people to offer support, and if someone is in a stūpa or shrine

source_sentence: 布施鈴鐸等　　不生罪惡地
translation: bestow gifts like bells, chimes, and so forth that will not give rise to sinful states

source_sentence: 常得梵音聲　　若人作伎樂
translation: always obtaining the sounds of Brahmā's voice, if someone creates music

source_sentence: 琴瑟鼓吹等　　供養佛聖賢
translation: offerings to the buddhas, saints, and good men by playing the lute.

source_sentence: 令聞心適悅　　當獲天耳根
translation: cause the mind to be pleased with hearing and will attain the divine ear faculty

source_sentence: 莊嚴常清淨　　復得金剛慧
translation: Their adornment is always pure, and they'll again attain adamantine wisdom.

source_sentence: 摧壞煩惱山　　若發信喜心
translation: destroy the mountain of afflictions, and if you give rise to faith and joy

source_sentence: 以妙色香味　　種種美飲食
translation: With marvelous form and fragrance, various kinds of delicious food

source_sentence: 供養諸佛等　　當生天界中
translation: offerings to the buddhas and so forth will be born in the heavenly realm

source_sentence: 眷屬同寶座　　以摩尼寶器
translation: all the members of the assembly were seated on the same precious throne, adorned with jeweled vessels

source_sentence: 食天上妙饌　　飢饉刀兵劫
translation: They eat heavenly delicacies and suffer from hunger, famine, warfare, and calamity.

source_sentence: 永不生其中　　若人以飲食
translation: never being born there. If someone were to give food and drink,

source_sentence: 供養聖賢眾　　當生人天中
translation: to make offerings to the noble and virtuous people who will be born among humans and gods

source_sentence: 美食常豐足　　種種而最上
translation: The food is always plentiful and the best of all kinds.

source_sentence: 智者恒敬愛　　若以美妙食
translation: The wise one always respects and loves it with delicious food.

source_sentence: 施彼出家者　　常獲富樂身
translation: Give them to those who leave home and always attain the body of wealth and happiness.

source_sentence: 辯才而長壽　　色力相具足
translation: With eloquence and longevity, he is endowed with the characteristics of form and strength.

source_sentence: 施食報如是　　若以慈愍心
translation: the reward of giving food is like this, if you show kindness and compassion

source_sentence: 施彼甘蜜水　　酥乳酪漿等
translation: give them sweet honey, water, butter, milk, cheese, juice, and so forth

source_sentence: 令彼渴乏者　　飲之獲安樂
translation: It causes those who are thirsty to drink it and attain well-being.

source_sentence: 亦得如前報　　若以呵梨勒
translation: You can also get the same reward as before, if you were to use a prātimokṣatra

source_sentence: 林藤諸藥草　　供施於聖賢
translation: trees, vines, herbs, and medicinal plants are offered to the noble ones

source_sentence: 當生人天中　　無病而長壽
translation: will be born among humans and gods, without illness and with a long life span

source_sentence: 恒獲身安樂　　又彼施漿飲
translation: They always attain physical well-being, and they give wine and drink.

source_sentence: 後得生天宮　　劫樹花芳盛
translation: Then he will be reborn in the heavenly palace, and the flowers of the kalpa tree will flourish.

source_sentence: 所求隨意得　　寶器酒蜜等
translation: Whatever one wishes to obtain, such as treasure vessels, wine, honey, etc.

source_sentence: 眷屬同所飲　　又復於劫樹
translation: Their followers are the same as those who drink it, and they're also in the kalpa tree.

source_sentence: 能出莊嚴具　　妓唱天樂等
translation: It produces the adornments, such as celestial music and singing.

source_sentence: 悅樂天眾心　　甘露復隨身
translation: Delighted by the minds of the gods, the ambrosia returns to their bodies

source_sentence: 施飲獲斯報　　若人設齋食
translation: Giving food and drink obtains this reward if someone sets up a meal.

source_sentence: 當得生人天　　遠離於貧寒
translation: you will be born among humans and gods, far removed from poverty and cold

source_sentence: 長命足財寶　　若以象馬等
translation: long life is sufficient for possessions and treasures, such as elephants, horses, etc.

source_sentence: 車乘及輦輿　　供施佛如來
translation: chariots, carts, carriages, and palanquins are offered to the Buddha Tathāgata

source_sentence: 當得大神通　　若施鞋襪等
translation: You'll attain great supernormal abilities if you give shoes and so forth.

source_sentence: 恒生上族家　　常有象馬車
translation: always born in a house of superior clans, always with an elephant-horse chariot

source_sentence: 永離貧辛苦　　師長等有病
translation: Being permanently free of poverty and hardship, teachers and elders have illnesses.

source_sentence: 若人懃承事　　當於一切處
translation: If someone is diligent in undertaking service, they'll serve everywhere.

source_sentence: 所求皆成就　　若施座具等
translation: Whatever one asks for, they'll be accomplished. If he gives a seat and so forth

source_sentence: 當生於天上　　不受苦辛勤
translation: They will be born in heaven and not experience suffering or hardship.

source_sentence: 常坐上妙座　　敷設臥具施
translation: always sits on a wonderful seat, spreads out bedding and gives

source_sentence: 生天恒快樂　　身相廣端直
translation: the gods who are born always happy, with a broad and straight body

source_sentence: 無畏人稱讚　　修種雜園林
translation: fearless and praised by others, cultivating a mixed forest

source_sentence: 嚴飾諸屋宅　　施人令遊止
translation: He adorned all the houses and gave them to those who wished to stay.

source_sentence: 身心生適悅　　當招歡喜園
translation: your body and mind will become comfortable, and you'll be invited to the joyous park

source_sentence: 天人遊行處　　與諸天女等
translation: Where gods and humans travel, they're accompanied by goddesses and so forth.

source_sentence: 嬉戲受快樂　　若於炎熱時
translation: playfulness and enjoyment of happiness, if it's a hot season

source_sentence: 而作陰涼施　　當感優曇鉢
translation: and make a cool gift of the aggregates that will bring about the attainment of the uḍumbhāra

source_sentence: 尼俱菩提樹　　復後得生天
translation: a tree of enlightenment that grows in the sky and will be reborn there

source_sentence: 恒受五欲樂　　井泉及池沼
translation: They always experience the pleasures of the five desires, wells, springs, ponds, and pools.

source_sentence: 修飾令嚴淨　　濟彼渴乏人
translation: He cultivates the adornments so that they are beautiful and pure, rescuing those who lack them.

source_sentence: 普皆令充足　　後報得生天
translation: all are made to be abundant, and the subsequently rewarded will be born in heaven

source_sentence: 或生於梵世　　種種受快樂
translation: Or they may be born in the Brahma world and experience various pleasures.

source_sentence: 復證寂滅果　　若以鉢多羅
translation: Further realizes the fruit of nirvāṇa if he uses a paṭala

source_sentence: 布施於三寶　　當生一切處
translation: Giving to the Three Treasures will lead to birth in all places

source_sentence: 富貴而快樂　　於彼世間中
translation: Wealthy and wealthy, yet happy, in that world

source_sentence: 尊高德最上　　復感諸眾生
translation: the supreme in terms of honor and virtue, which again brings about sentient beings

source_sentence: 恒時而供養　　智者若施刀
translation: always and continuously offering support to the wise man if he gives him a sword

source_sentence: 當得生天上　　智慧極聰利
translation: you will be born in heaven, with the utmost intelligence

source_sentence: 永不值刀兵　　若人施其針
translation: never meets a sword or soldier, and if someone gives him a needle

source_sentence: 智慧恒猛利　　能斷諸煩惱
translation: Their wisdom is always intense, able to eliminate all afflictions.

source_sentence: 證彼寂靜道　　佛說若有人
translation: To realize the path of quiescence, the Buddha teaches that if there are people

source_sentence: 塑畫於佛像　　生於天界中
translation: a statue of the Buddha is painted in the heavenly realm and born in the heavenly realm

source_sentence: 身體真金色　　清淨光如日
translation: His body is truly golden, pure and shining like the sun

source_sentence: 而諸天人眾　　天男及天女
translation: And all the gods, men, goddesses and goddesses.

source_sentence: 恒時而歸命　　若彼智慧人
translation: always returning to life at the right time, if that wise person

source_sentence: 善能說法施　　天上人間生
translation: well able to teach the Dharma and give it to gods and humans who are born in heaven

source_sentence: 智德力具足　　恒受於快樂
translation: Endowed with knowledge, virtue, and power, they always experience happiness.

source_sentence: 永離憂悲苦　　於其後有身
translation: Being permanently free of sorrow, pity, and suffering, there is a body after him

source_sentence: 得證寂滅道　　若彼諸有情
translation: If those sentient beings who realize the path to cessation

source_sentence: 書寫妙法寶　　當得宿命智
translation: write the wonderful treasure of the Dharma, and you will attain the knowledge of past lives

source_sentence: 富貴恒安樂　　而滅一切罪
translation: wealthy and prosperous, always at peace, yet extinguishing all sins

source_sentence: 經彼俱胝劫　　不墮於地獄
translation: Through that kalpa, they won't fall into hell for a hundred eons

source_sentence: 及與鬼畜生　　若彼有智者
translation: and with ghosts, animals, and sentient beings if they have knowledge

source_sentence: 掃灑結壇場　　旋繞散香花
translation: sweep the altar site, circumambulate it, and scatter incense and flowers

source_sentence: 恒時而供養　　後生於人間
translation: offerings are always offered, and they'll be born in the human world afterward

source_sentence: 及生於天上　　恒受於富貴
translation: And being born in heaven always receives wealth.

source_sentence: 復證寂滅故　　若以長明燈
translation: It's because they again realize nirvāṇa if they use a long illuminating lamp.

source_sentence: 供養佛賢聖　　生彼人天中
translation: to make offerings to the buddhas, good men, and sages who are born among humans and gods

source_sentence: 三眼常清淨　　慧眼與天眼
translation: The three eyes are always pure, the eye of wisdom and the divine eye

source_sentence: 及於肉眼故　　又彼施燈者
translation: And because of the physical eye, they give it to someone who gives a lamp.

source_sentence: 常得生天上　　口亦不瘖瘂
translation: always able to be born in heaven, his mouth also not angry

source_sentence: 耳眼無聾眇　　又彼施燈者
translation: Their ears and eyes have no deafness or dumbness, and they give the lamp.

source_sentence: 非唯三眼淨　　能於正覺法
translation: It is not only the purity of the three eyes that enables one to attain enlightenment.

source_sentence: 一切悉通達　　智者若施財
translation: everything is completely comprehended by the wise person who gives property

source_sentence: 供養有德眾　　沙門婆羅門
translation: to make offerings to a group of virtuous ascetics and priests

source_sentence: 少施獲多報　　廣得順道財
translation: little donation obtains much reward, widely attains the wealth of the path

source_sentence: 長時而受用　　又彼行施者
translation: For a long time, they'll receive and use it. Also, those who practice generosity

source_sentence: 食施畜生類　　所獲於福德
translation: to feed on the merits gained by animals that are given

source_sentence: 而成於百倍　　若以財食等
translation: It's a hundredfold greater than if you were to use possessions, food, and so forth

source_sentence: 布施於罪人　　功利漸加殊
translation: Giving to sinners gradually increases in merit and profit

source_sentence: 獲福成千倍　　若施持戒人
translation: One obtains a thousandfold increase in merit if one gives to someone who upholds the precepts.

source_sentence: 福獲千百倍　　供養無心人
translation: the merit obtained is a thousand times greater than that offered to someone without mind

source_sentence: 得益百俱胝　　若人施有學
translation: One hundred koṭis of benefits are obtained if someone gives to those who have training.

source_sentence: 及彼無學者　　所獲於福德
translation: and the merits attained by those who have no scholarship

source_sentence: 比前而最上　　若施佛如來
translation: It's the highest compared to the previous one, and if you give it to the Buddha Tathāgata

source_sentence: 當生於天上　　大富永不斷
translation: They will be born in heaven, where their great wealth will never end.

source_sentence: 恒受於快樂　　乃至盡輪迴
translation: always experience happiness up to the end of transmigration

source_sentence: 而證寂滅法　　我集此一切
translation: yet he realizes the principle of nirvāṇa, whereby all things are collected together into a self.

source_sentence: 佛說伽陀經　　略明於福報
translation: The Buddha teaches the scripture on the merits, which briefly explains the rewards of virtue

source_sentence: 普令生信受　　假使千光日
translation: cause all sentient beings to give rise to faith, even if it were a thousand suns of light

source_sentence: 吉祥照大地　　夜分滿月輝
translation: the auspicious illuminates the earth, the nighttime portion is full of moonlight

source_sentence: 能開青蓮花　　水天毘沙門
translation: can bloom blue lotus flowers, the water god Vaiśravaṇa

source_sentence: 帝釋那羅延　　上首諸天等
translation: Indra, Śakra, Nārāyaṇa, the chief gods, and so forth

source_sentence: 俱因行施得　　日行於虛空
translation: Through the act of giving one obtains a heavenly moon that moves in space.

source_sentence: 上下普皆照　　能活諸物命
translation: Both above and below are universally illuminated, which can save the lives of all things.

source_sentence: 時至亦無常　　帝釋四天王
translation: When the time arrives, it's also impermanent, Indra and the four heavenly kings.

source_sentence: 并及諸天眾　　福壽窮盡時
translation: and the gods and goddesses, when their blessedness is exhausted

source_sentence: 而入死冤口　　憂悲苦惱火
translation: yet he enters the mouth of death and enmity, grieving with sorrow and the fire of pain

source_sentence: 不住被焚燒　　是故勸汝等
translation: Do not abide in being burned; therefore, I encourage you.

source_sentence: 觀察無常身　　遠離欲渴心
translation: Observing the impermanent body, he's far removed from desire and thirst

source_sentence: 勿耽人天樂　　須臾不久長
translation: Don't indulge in the pleasures of humans and gods for a moment or long time

source_sentence: 皆歸於散壞　　我發淨信心
translation: They all return to disintegration, and I give rise to pure faith.

source_sentence: 捨離虛幻樂　　常詣於佛前
translation: to abandon the pleasure of illusory illusions and always go to the Buddha

source_sentence: 合掌而親近　　以自大菩提
translation: He joins his palms and approaches with his own great enlightenment

source_sentence: 而作解脫主
translation: yet he remains the king of liberation.

source_sentence: 賢聖集伽陀一百頌
translation: One hundred stanzas of the Sutra of the Collection of the Sages and saints, gathering together the teachings of the Buddha
